name: Ruffwear, Grip Trex Dog Shoes, Non-Slip Boots for Hot Pavement & Snow, Weatherproof Paw Protection with Breathable Mesh, Rugged Sole for Hiking, Obsidian Black, 2.50"
short_description: TRAIL-TESTED GRIP FOR EVERY TERRAIN. Built with rugged Vibram Outsoles for non-slip traction. Whether you're crossing hot pavement, slick tile, rocky trails or everything else in between.

SOLD IN PAIRS – NOT A SET OF 4. Dogs often have wider front paws than rear paws. That’s why we sell our dog boots in pairs—so you can mix sizes and get the perfect fit on all four paws. A better fit means fewer slips and more miles together.
STAY-ON FIT, EVEN DURING ZOOMIES. Adjustable hook-and-loop ankle straps and ergonomic shape help the shoes for dogs stay on. Even for strong pullers and high-energy pups.
DESIGNED FOR ALL-SEASON PROTECTION. Breathable yet durable, the ripstop upper blocks heat, snow, salt, and moisture—helping paws stay protected from trails to sidewalks.
COMFORT THAT MOVES WITH THEM. Padded mesh lining and flexible sole support natural movement. No rubbing, chafing, or stiff walking. Perfect for long walks with your small, medium, or large size dog.

short_description: DOG BOOTS FOR SMALL & MEDIUM DOGS:It can be used on roads after rainy or snowy weather, as well as on grasslands and surfaces with high moisture content. If you always worry about the water on the ground getting wet on your pet's fur. Please be sure to measure your pet before purchasing. If your measurements fall between two sizes, we recommend choosing the larger dog boots.

ADJUSTABLE BUCKLE AND REFLECTIVE EDGE DESIGN: The dog rain boots with suspenders have three buckles on the back to help you adjust the size of the rain boots and make them safer and less likely to fall off. Rain boots have reflective strips on the neck and legs, making nighttime travel safer.

INTEGRATED RAIN BOOTS: Our one-piece rain boots can prevent dogs from falling off while walking and playing outdoors, allowing them to play freely and release their nature without being affected by weather and the ground. Reduce your annoyance of always wearing dropped shoes for your dog outdoors.

NON-SLIP, Water-Resistant PROTECTION: The bottom of the dog shoes are made of waterproof rubber material to keep your dog's feet dry and clean during rainy and snow days. The rubber particles at the bottom of the shoes are designed to maximize grip, protecting the paws when walking on hardwood floors or outdoors, making them ideal anti slip dog socks for dogs.

MULTI-PURPOSE DOG SOCKS: Anti slip dog shoes not only protect the dog's paws from mud and water stains, keep the dog's feet clean when going out, the front chest while the dog is playing. In addition, the design of the hind leg gap reduces the impact of rain boots on the dog's excretion and does not interfere with the dog's outdoor life.

name: KOOLTAIL Anti Slip Winter Dog Socks to Prevent Licking Paws, Waterproof Snow Rain Long Dog Boots&Paw Protector, Warm Grippy Booties Reflective Double Straps for Hardwood Floor, Small Medium Large Dogs
short_description: LOOPED FLEECE WARM MATERIAL, COTTON SKIN-FRIENDLY: Made of cotton + rubber with thickened looped fleece inside. It locks in warmth during autumn and winter outdoor walks, keeps the dog socks clean, and protects the dog's paws from the irritation of wet and icy surfaces.

HEIGHTENED WATERPROOF & NON-SLIP, MULTI-EFFECT PROTECTION: Made of neoprene upper and heightened non-slip rubber sole for better wear resistance. It shields paws from hot roads, ice, snow and rough terrain, replaces rain boots to prevent frostbite, and stops indoor slipping, floor scratches and outdoor mud.

UPGRADED HIKING DESIGN, EASY TO PUT ON & TAKE OFF: Easy to put on and take off, the reflective strap fixation improves visibility at night. The hook-and-loop fastener is directly sewn on the sock body, replacing traditional buttons, which prevents falling off and avoids paw friction; the thickened ribbed cuff design provides extra warmth in autumn and winter, suitable for outdoor hiking scenarios.

EXCLUSIVE FOR SMALL & MEDIUM DOGS, PAW & WOUND PROTECTION: As a special paw protection equipment for small and medium-sized dogs, it can effectively prevent dogs from biting and licking paw wounds, reduce the risk of secondary wound infection, and protect paw health in daily life and outdoors.

ALL-SCENARIO ADAPTATION, SUITABLE FOR ALL SEASONS: The durable waterproof design is suitable for outdoor adventures such as hiking, mountain biking, and beach outings; it can prevent slipping on smooth indoor floors and when going up and down stairs. It also provides joint protection for elderly dogs with joint problems and is suitable for all seasons.

name: EXPAWLORER Anti-Slip Dog Socks,Dog Boots&Paw Protectors to Prevent Licking,Dog Shoes for Hot/Cold Pavement, Double Sides Non-Skid Traction Control on Hardwood Floor for Senior Dogs
short_description: [Prevent From Licking] Our innovative dog socks are specially designed to help prevent your furry companion from licking their paws! These socks are an excellent solution for pet owners experiencing excessive paw licking due to allergies. These anti-lick dog socks are a must-have for any pet owner looking to enhance their dog's health and well-being. Say goodbye to sore, irritated paws for good!

[Double Side No-Skid] It's our patent-exclusive design, Each side of the sock has [21 Cute Little Paw Grips] to provide strong extra traction when your dog is walking on the smooth floor. Even if the socks twist, they will still work. It's good for active dogs, and If your senior dogs has problems who was splaying and keeps slipping on your wooden floors with their back legs, it can help your old friends walk around in the house again!

[Premium Material] Made of elastic and comfortable breathable knit fabric, It's soft and light, so dogs will easier to accept it, The durable bottom with extra-thick grip is specially crafted to shield your furry companion's paws from the hot and cold pavement, and rough outdoor surfaces. these socks create a protective barrier between your dog's paw pads and the ground, guarding against extreme temperatures and rugged terrain.

[Anti-Fall Off] Updated with wider and longer elastic sticky straps, there is more room for adjustment depending on your dog's feet, to prevent socks from falling off, greatly increase wearing comfort, and keep your socks safe from scratches in the wash, we’ve designed a removable sticky straps so you can easily take it off before washing.
